tha-ap74:0.3_0: he has laid down this lamp on the senior monks.
tha-ap74:1.1_0: Having seen the state of grace,
tha-ap74:1.2_0: of the lay life, and the Kinsman of the Sun,
tha-ap74:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap74:3.1_0: Seven from here, seven from there—
tha-ap74:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap74:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Padussa.
tha-ap74:6.1_0: for the senior mendicants, the second part of the night.
